member.name: T:OntaviSDK.CloudStorage.AzureStorageEndpoint
member.summary: Describes an Azure Blob Storage account that in a [[Pipeline]] will consume.

member.name: P:OntaviSDK.CloudStorage.AzureStorageEndpoint.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the Azure Storage connection string for the endpoint.

member.name: T:OntaviSDK.CloudStorage.ListBlobsMiddleware
member.summary: Gets a list of blobs from cloud storage.

member.name: P:OntaviSDK.CloudStorage.ListBlobsMiddleware.StorageEndpoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the from which to list blobs.

member.name: P:OntaviSDK.CloudStorage.ListBlobsMiddleware.ContainerName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the container from which to get a list of blobs.

member.name: P:OntaviSDK.CloudStorage.ListBlobsMiddleware.List
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of files in blob storage.

member.name: T:OntaviSDK.CloudStorage.ReadBlobMiddleware
member.summary: Reads a blob from cloud storage and outputs the blob content.

member.name: P:OntaviSDK.CloudStorage.ReadBlobMiddleware.StorageEndpoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the from which the blob should be read.

member.name: P:OntaviSDK.CloudStorage.ReadBlobMiddleware.ContainerName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the container or bucket in which the blob resides.

member.name: P:OntaviSDK.CloudStorage.ReadBlobMiddleware.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the file in blob storage to read.

member.name: P:OntaviSDK.CloudStorage.ReadBlobMiddleware.FileContents
member.summary: Gets or sets the contents of the file in blob storage.
